alert.note: Alert for Adams (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:43AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Adams County through 315 AM CDT... At 243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roseland, or 9 miles southwest of Hastings, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ayr. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
